DOC.brief_summary: The aim present study determine cardiovascular function/ cardio respiratory interaction spontaneous breathing trial patient prolong weaning .
DOC.brief_title: Examination Cardiovascular Function/ Cardio Respiratory Interaction Spontaneous Breathing Trials Patients Prolonged Weaning
DOC.criteria: legal Age ( ≥18 year ) write informed consent Prior study participation patient prolong wean NYHA III actual positive Ventilator Screening test : 1 . PaO2 ≥ 60 mmHg FiO2 ≤ 0.4 2 . PEEP ≤ 8 cmH2O 3 . Glasgow Coma Scale > 13 4 . Temp . < 38°C 5 . Hb > 80100 g/L 6. le requirement catecholamine ( < 0.1µg/kg/min ) patient already perform spontaneous breathe trial follow result : 1. abortion spontaneous breathe trial < 30min , possible > 10min 2. reason abortion NOT hypercapnia wean patient assign Group 12 patient heart failure ( NYHA IIIIV ) and/ cardiac comorbidity acute NSTEMI ( nonSTsegment elevation myocardial infarction ) pregnancy breastfeed
